title: THEMIS-D (P3):  On Board moments:  Electron/Ion moments density, flux, velocity, pressure and temperature. - V. Angelopoulos, C.W. Carlson & J. McFadden (UCB, NASA NAS5-02099)

info.contact: V. Angelopoulos, C.W. Carlson & J. McFadden @ UCB, NASA NAS5-02099

parameters.name: thd_peim_data_quality
parameters.description: Ion Moment Data Quality (0: good data, non-zero: Data may not be suitable, see: http://themis.ssl.berkeley.edu/mom_flag.shtml.)

parameters.name: thd_peim_densityQ
parameters.description: (Good data only) ESA On Board Moment (MOM) Ion Density, THEMIS-D. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_peim_density', 'thd_peim_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: ESA On Board Moment (MOM) Ion Density, THEMIS-D

parameters.name: thd_peim_ptotQ
parameters.description: -----Ion Total Pressure. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_peim_ptot', 'thd_peim_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thd_peim_fluxQ
parameters.description: -----Ion Particle Flux Vector. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_peim_flux', 'thd_peim_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thd_peim_mftensQ
parameters.description: -----Ion Momentum Flux Tensor. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_peim_mftens', 'thd_peim_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thd_peim_efluxQ
parameters.description: -----Ion Energy Flux Vector. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['thd_peim_eflux', 'thd_peim_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: thd_peim_velocity_dslQ
parameters.description: -----Ion Velocity Vector in DSL.
